summary: Build an Android APK for an AI assistant named AJ.1 with multilingual fluency, clear step-by-step explanations, logical problem-solving, adaptive explanation level, clarifying questions when needed, and safety-focused behavior with a calm, slightly futuristic personality.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- AJ.1 app icon in a calm futuristic style (aj1-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- AJ.1 minimalist wordmark/logo on transparent background (aj1-logo.dim_1024x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create an AJ.1 assistant chat experience that lets users enter a question/problem and receive a structured response that follows the workflow: (1) identify the core issue, (2) break into smaller parts, (3) explain step-by-step, (4) provide examples when helpful, and (5) conclude with a clear next action or summary.
Add user controls to adapt explanation level (Beginner / Student / Expert) and ensure the assistant response tone remains calm, friendly, confident, and slightly futuristic across all responses.

Implement multilingual understanding/response mode by adding a language selector for major world languages and localizing all UI strings; the assistant should produce responses in the selected language.
When a user prompt is ambiguous or missing key details, the assistant must ask clarifying questions before attempting a full solution, and it must explicitly state what information is missing.
Enforce a safety policy in the assistant response pipeline so the assistant never provides harmful, illegal, or unsafe instructions; it should refuse and redirect to safe alternatives when needed.
Persist per-user settings (selected language, explanation level) and conversation history linked to the authenticated Internet Identity principal, so returning users can continue where they left off.

Apply a coherent visual theme and layout for AJ.1 that feels calm and slightly futuristic, using a consistent palette, typography, spacing, and component styling across the app (do not use a blue/purple primary scheme).
Brand the application as “AJ.1” throughout the UI (header/title/about) and provide an app icon and simple logo/wordmark for AJ.1 as static assets.

Document APK-related expectations in-app: clearly state that this deliverable is a web app on the Internet Computer, and provide a short note that packaging into an Android APK would be a separate, external step not produced by this build.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an Android APK app for the AI assistant named AJ.1
Support fluent understanding and responses in all major world languages
Provide simple, step-by-step explanations for complex topics with examples when needed
Implement structured, accurate, confident problem-solving workflow (identify core issue, break down, explain clearly)
Ask clarifying questions when the user query is unclear
Enforce safety policy: never provide harmful, illegal, or unsafe instructions
Adapt explanation level to the user (beginner/student/expert) and maintain calm, friendly, slightly futuristic tone
